mainText:
Steve's visions have changed the way we live, the way we will see the 
world forever and I am eternally grateful.
It was his speech at Stanford that inspired me and always inspires me 
and reminds me to continue to do what I love and do all I can through my 
company, to teach young people how it is do find out what you 
love  and DO IT...
As Steve said "Don't settle... have the courage to follow your heart 
and intuition....your time is limited so don't waste it living someone 
else's life.. Dont let the other voices drown out your
own. Everything else is secondary.."
header: Very Sad but lucky to be inspired and touched by Steve
author: Helene
